text: Zakerana murthii (common names: Ghats wart frog, Murthy's frog) is a critically endangered species of frog that is endemic to the Western Ghats in Tamil Nadu and Karnataka states, India. It resembles Zakerana greenii. It is a little-known species from tropical moist forests. ==References== murthii Category:Frogs of India Category:Endemic fauna of the Western Ghats Category:Amphibians described in 1979
title: Zakerana murthii
